AuthoringStatus.description: The authoring status for a landing zone configuration.

values.name: Authoring
values.description: 'Authoring' is the default status when a create configuration request is made. In this state, the Landing zone configuration can be modified.

values.name: ReadyForUse
values.description: 'ReadyForUse' status is set when the configuration updates are finished, and the configuration is ready for code generation or deployment.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: 'Disabled' status is set when the landing zone configuration is no longer in use.

create.description: This parameter determines whether the 'Decommissioned' management group will be created. If set to true, the group will be created; if set to false, it will not be created. The default value is false.

FirewallCreationOptions.description: Parameter used for deploying or not a Firewall resource.

values.name: None
values.description: Select 'None' value to skip Firewall deployment.

values.name: Standard
values.description: Select 'Standard' value to deploy the Firewall Standard SKU.

values.name: Premium
values.description: Select 'Premium' value to deploy the Firewall Premium SKU.

GenerateLandingZoneRequest.description: The request to generate Infrastructure as Code (IaC) for a landing zone.

infrastructureAsCodeOutputOptions.description: The export options available for code generation.

existingManagementSubscriptionId.description: Existing 'Management' subscription ID to be linked with this deployment when reusing instead of creating a new subscription.

existingIdentitySubscriptionId.description: Existing 'Identity' subscription ID to be linked with this deployment when reusing instead of creating a new subscription.

existingConnectivitySubscriptionId.description: Existing 'Connectivity' subscription ID to be linked with this deployment when reusing instead of creating a new subscription.

subscriptionBillingScope.description: The complete resource ID of the billing scope linked to the EA, MCA, or MPA account where you want to create the subscription.

existingTopLevelMgParentId.description: Optional parent for the management group hierarchy, serving as an intermediate root management group parent if specified. If left empty, the default will be to deploy under the tenant root management group.

deploymentPrefix.description: The prefix that will be added to all resources created by this deployment. Use between 2 and 5 characters, consisting only of letters, digits, '-', '.', or '_'. No other special characters are supported.

deploymentSuffix.description: The optional suffix that will be appended to all resources created by this deployment, maximum 5 characters.

topLevelMgDisplayName.description: The display name assigned to the top management group of the landing zone deployment hierarchy. It is recommended to use unique names for each landing zone deployment.

deploymentLocation.description: The Azure region where the landing zone will be deployed. All Azure regions are supported.

organization.description: The name of the organization or agency for which the landing zone is being deployed. This is optional.

environment.description: The environment where the landing zone is being deployed, such as ppe, prod, test, etc.

GenerateLandingZoneResponse.description: The response payload for generating infrastructure-as-code for the landing zone.

topLevelMgDisplayName.description: The parent management group name of the landing zone deployment.

landingZoneConfigurationName.description: The name of the Landing zone configuration resource.

generatedCodeUrl.description: The url to access the generated code.

storageAccountName.description: The storage account name to access the generated code.

containerName.description: The storage account container to access the generated code.

blobName.description: The storage account blob name to access the generated code.

generatedArmTemplate.description: The generated code content in JSON string format.

InfrastructureAsCodeOutputOptions.description: Output options for landing zone code generation.

values.name: Bicep
values.description: Value when generating Landing zone code in Bicep format.

values.name: ARM
values.description: Value when generating Landing zone code in ARM format.

ddosProtectionCreationOption.description: Parameter used to deploy a DDoS protection plan: Select 'Yes' to enable deployment, 'No' to skip it, or 'Existing' to reuse an existing DDoS protection plan.

existingDdosProtectionId.description: The resource ID of the DDoS protection plan when reusing an existing one.

logAnalyticsWorkspaceCreationOption.description: Parameter used to deploy a log analytics workspace: Select 'Yes' to enable deployment, 'No' to skip it, or 'Existing' to reuse an existing log analytics workspace.

existingLogAnalyticsWorkspaceId.description: The resource ID of the log analytics workspace when reusing an existing one.

tags.description: Tags are key-value pairs that can be assigned to a resource to organize and manage it more effectively. Example: {'name': 'a tag name', 'value': 'a tag value'}

firewallCreationOption.description: Parameter used for deploying a Firewall: Select 'No' to skip deployment, 'Standard' to deploy the Standard SKU, or 'Premium' to deploy the Premium SKU.

firewallSubnetCidrBlock.description: The Firewall subnet address used for deploying a firewall. Specify the Firewall subnet using IPv4 CIDR notation.

gatewaySubnetCidrBlock.description: The gateway subnet address used for deploying a virtual network. Specify the subnet using IPv4 CIDR notation.

logRetentionInDays.description: Parameter to define the retention period for logs, in days. The minimum duration is 30 days and the maximum is 730 days.

hubNetworkCidrBlock.description: The Virtual Network address. Specify the address using IPv4 CIDR notation.

azureBastionCreationOption.description: Parameter used to deploy a Bastion: Select 'Yes' to enable deployment, 'No' to skip it, or 'Existing' to reuse an existing Bastion.

existingAzureBastionId.description: The resource ID of the Bastion when reusing an existing one.

azureBastionSubnetCidrBlock.description: The Bastion subnet address. Specify the address using IPv4 CIDR notation.
